long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing FocusFeed - your essential companion for a distraction-free social media experience. This extension is designed to streamline your interaction across various social platforms, enhancing productivity and focus.

Key Features:

YouTube Simplified: Automatically redirects YouTube's home page to subscriptions and removes video recommendations, keeping you focused on your favorite content. You can choose to hide all shorts content and the comments section on video pages as well.

Beyond YouTube: Expanding our focus to encompass more platforms, including Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook, to deliver a more streamlined browsing experience.
Shorts Filter: Future updates will include an option to filter out shorts and similar content across platforms for a more traditional browsing experience.
FocusFeed is dedicated to enhancing your digital life by minimizing distractions and maximizing productivity. With us, your online browsing becomes more intentional and efficient.

Try it now and witness a transformation in your online experience!
